channel.title: Errors on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in Errors on Today I Learned

item.title: Debugging & Common Errors
item.description: Errors and Error Propagation Errors can come from outside the program. Cases: (Malformed inputs [2, 3, ‘Hello’, null, undefined, ‘/']); Network Failure Authentication Failures Example Errors: 500: Internal Server Error 501: Not implemented 502: Bad Gateway 503: Service Unavailable 504: Gateway Timeout 505: HTTP Version Not Supported 506: Variant Also Negotiates (RFC 2295) 507: Insufficent Storage (WebDAV; RFC 4918) 508: Loop Detected (WebDAV, RFC 5842) 510: Not Extended (RFC 2774) 511: Network Authentication Required (RFC 6585) Steps to Debugging Debugging Algorithm:
